weekly_top_story.headline: China signals cutback on electric vehicle subsidies amid global market push
weekly_top_story.summary: China announced it will phase out subsidies for its electric vehicle industry, signaling a major policy shift as it seeks to address oversupply and increase competitiveness in global markets, which could reshape the global EV industry and climate goals.

stories.headline: Israel resumes Gaza ceasefire after strikes kill over 100 people
stories.summary: Following intense conflict resulting in over 100 casualties in Gaza, Israel has resumed the ceasefire, a development critical to de-escalating violence and addressing the humanitarian crisis in the region.

stories.headline: Tanzania deploys military and imposes curfew amid election-day protests
stories.summary: Tanzania’s presidential election day was marked by violent protests leading to military deployment and curfew imposition, raising concerns about stability in one of East Africa’s key countries.
